==== invalidLetInForOfAndForIn_ES6.ts (7 errors) ====
    // This should be an error
    // More details: http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/6.0/#sec-iteration-statements
    
    var let = 10;
    for (let of [1,2,3]) {}
                ~
!!! error TS1005: ',' expected.
                ~

                 ~~~

                      ~
!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.
                       ~
